Package org.bson

Contains the base BSON classes.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ByteBuf
    An interface wrapper around a java.nio.ByteBuffer which additionally is Closeable, so that pooled byte buffers know how to release themselves back to the pool.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BSONBinaryReader  
    BSONBinaryWriter  
    BSONBinaryWriterSettings  
    BSONReader  
    BSONReaderSettings  
    BSONWriter
    Represents a BSON writer for some external format (see subclasses).
    BSONWriterSettings  
    ByteBufNIO
    Implementation of ByteBuf which simply wraps an NIO ByteBuffer and forwards all calls to it.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    BSONBinarySubType  
    BSONContextType
    Used by BSONReaders and BSONWriters to represent the current context.
    BSONReader.State  
    BSONType  
    BSONWriter.State  
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    BSONException
    A general runtime exception raised in BSON processing.
    BSONInvalidOperationException  
    BSONSerializationException  

Package org.bson Description

Contains the base BSON classes.
